requestBody: {"input":[{"role":"system","content":[{"text":"You are a helpful assistant with math and code execution capabilities.","type":"input_text"}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"input_text","text":"Calculate the square root of 144, then write Python code to find the factorial of 5."}]}],"model":"gpt-5-nano","max_output_tokens":200,"stream":true,"tools":[{"type":"function","name":"calculate_math","description":"Perform mathematical calculations","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"expression":{"description":"Mathematical expression to evaluate","type":"string"}},"required":["expression"]}},{"type":"code_interpreter"}],"temperature":0.3}
notes: Function call (math) and code interpreter in streaming mode - this tests the challenging scenario
